description: A measurement for a sample, including links to its output file(s)

channel.description: For flow cytometry, the name of the channel used by this measurement

files.description: File relative path and descriptive metadata

measurement_group_id.description: Measurement group id, represents a single logical measurement from a lab that aggregates multiple related samples and files

id.description: A localized, unique measurement id relating a given sample to one or more files

measurement_name.description: Challenge problem- or topic-specific name suggested by the labs and TA1 performers

reference_sequence.description: Path to a FASTA/GFF without the extension, ex. agave://data-sd2e-community/reference/novel-chassis/MG1655 where the references are named MG1655.fa and MG1655.gff
